attributes.additional_details:
After so many contradictive statements on oath at the Leveson Enquiry,obviously someone is not telling the truth.Conveniently forgetting major events,to my mind is not acceptable.
    I petition the government to pursue this matter with all prejudice and prosecute those that are found breaking the law of this country.
    For the sake of the law,which should apply to all and not most.
     Thank you.
